actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act and chapter 21 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase from $150 to $500 the minimum amount of cash remuneration which a farm worker must generally receive from an employer in any year (for agricultural labor) in order for such remuneration to constitute covered wages for purposes of social security benefits and taxes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $150 to $500 the minimum amount of wages which a farm worker must receive from an employer in order to be eligible for OASDI benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act and chapter 21 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase from $150 to $500 the minimum amount of cash remuneration which a farm worker must generally receive from an employer in any year (for agricultural labor) in order for such remuneration to constitute covered wages for purposes of social security benefits and taxes.
